name: Simaze
description:
-SIMAZE-

A SIMPLE MAZE GAME

It's simple. Find the key and find the exit.

How To Play:

Tap the arrows to move one space.  Collect dots for ammunition (Max 5) and tap anywhere on the screen to fire in that direction.

The enemies will move when you either move or shoot, the 'X's around them represent a potential space they can move to. It takes one hit to destroy them.

Though there is one enemy where these rules dont apply..
